section.title: Overview
section.para:
The educational indicators to be tracked should be at a macro-level – dealing with program performance rather than of individual student/staff performance. The following key performance areas were identified to tracked on the Dean’s dashboard:
Student selection, admission and numbers
Student progression and achievement
Student development support and guidance
Teaching and learning
Research
Human Resources
Budgeting and fiscal management
Alumni (graduate tracking)
